View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.sqlite;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.accessible.DataAccess;
4   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
5   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
6   import spring.SpringApp;
7   
8   import java.util.ArrayList;
9   import java.util.Collection;
10  import java.util.List;
11  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
12  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
13  
14  public abstract class ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
15  
16      public ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT() {
17          this.config();
18      }
19      
20      public void config() {
21  
22          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
23          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
24          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsSqlite.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
25  
26          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "musicstore";
27          this.jsqlTableName = "Student";
28          this.jsqlColumnName = "Student_Id";
29          
30          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "sqlite_master";
31          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
32          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "sql";
33          
34          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select '"+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +"' "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" from "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" WHERE type = 'table'";
35          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames =    "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForTableName +" from sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table'";
36          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =   "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForColumnName +" from "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" where tbl_name = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"' and type = 'table'";
37          this.jdbcQueryForValues =    "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlTableName;
38      }
39      
40      @Override
41      protected Collection<String> parse(List<String> rawColumns) {
42          
43          String modelColumns = rawColumns.stream().findFirst().orElseThrow();
44          String columnsToParse = this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getSqlite().transformSqlite(modelColumns);
45          
46          Matcher regexSearch = Pattern.compile(
47                  DataAccess.MODE
48                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
49                  + DataAccess.CELL_TABLE
50                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
51              )
52              .matcher(columnsToParse);
53  
54          List<String> columns = new ArrayList<>();
55          
56          while (regexSearch.find()) {
57              columns.add(regexSearch.group(1));
58          }
59          
60          return columns;
61      }
62  }
